title: (x) all caps sans serif - Cees Bold {Preston Miura}
content: What a small type world. This recent [thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130123/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/33408.html?1081914523), led me to your mystery typeface [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130123/http:/www.typeworkshop.com/index.php?id1=Rotterdam_12_2002&id2=day4). Cees-Bold. I doubt that it is publicly available.
author: pmiura
